src:
Live Streaming Barcelona vs Slavia Praha di Vidio
05 Nov 2019, 23:24 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sudah sangat lama sejak terakhir kali Barcelona menelan kekalahan kandang di Liga Champions Eropa. Meski baru saja dipermalukan Levante di La Liga, Barcelona tetap diunggulkan menang saat meladeni Slavia Praha.
Pemimpin klasemen Barcelona akan menjamu tim juru kunci Slavia Praha di Camp Nou pada matchday 4 Grup F Liga Champions 2019/20, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Barcelona tak terkalahkan dalam 33 laga kandang terakhirnya di Liga Champions (M30 S3 K0), sejak September 2013. Itu menjadi salah satu alasan untuk mengunggulkan sang raksasa Catalunya.
Pada matchday 3, yang merupakan pertemuan perdana mereka, Barcelona menang 2-1 di kandang Slavia Praha. Lionel Messi mencetak gol perdananya di Liga Champions musim ini untuk memecah kebuntuan pada menit 3, Slavia menyamakan kedudukan lewat Jan Boril menit 50, dan Barcelona memastikan kemenangan di Republik Ceko melalui bunuh diri Peter Olayinka tujuh menit berselang.
Akhir pekan kemarin, rentetan tujuh kemenangan Barcelona di semua kompetisi diputus oleh tuan rumah Levante di La Liga. Barcelona unggul terlebih dahulu melalui penalti Messi di menit 38, tapi akhirnya menyerah 1-3 setelah kebobolan tiga gol di babak kedua. Barcelona juga kehilangan Luis Suarez di laga tersebut, yang mengalami cedera betis sebelum jeda.
Barcelona pasti dituntut untuk memberikan respons positif. Kemenangan atas Slavia pun menjadi target wajib.
Barcelona saat ini memimpin klasemen dengan 7 poin, diikuti Inter Milan (4), Borussia Dortmund (4). Sementara itu, Slavia Praha berada di posisi terbawah dengan poin 1.
Kemenangan akan menempatkan Barcelona di posisi yang bagus untuk lolos ke babak berikutnya.

Simak Live Streaming Barcelona vs Slavia Praha di Bawah Ini.
text:
Live Streaming Barcelona vs Slavic Prague in Video
05 Nov 2019, 23:24 by Bola.net
Bola.net - It's been a long time since Barcelona last swallowed a home defeat in the European Champions League. Even though Levante had just been humiliated in La Liga, Barcelona still won the favor when serving Slavia Prague.
Leaders Barcelona will host the Slavic caretaker team at Camp Nou on Matchday 4 in Group F of the 2019/20 Champions League, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 33 home games in the Champions League (M30 S3 K0), since September 2013. That is one reason to favor the Catalunya giants.
On Matchday 3, which was their first meeting, Barcelona won 2-1 at home to Slavia Prague. Lionel Messi scored his first goal in the Champions League this season to break the deadlock in the 3rd minute, Slavia equalized through Jan Boril in the 50th minute, and Barcelona sealed the victory in the Czech Republic through the suicide of Peter Olayinka seven minutes later.
Last weekend, a series of seven wins for Barcelona in all competitions were decided by host Levante in La Liga. Barcelona took the lead through Messi's penalty in the 38th minute, but eventually gave up 1-3 after conceding three goals in the second half. Barcelona also lost Luis Suarez in the match, who suffered a calf injury before the break.
Barcelona must be demanded to give a positive response. Victory over Slavia has become a mandatory target.
Barcelona currently leads the standings with 7 points, followed by Inter Milan (4), Borussia Dortmund (4). Meanwhile, Slavia Prague is at the bottom with 1 point.
A win would put Barcelona in a good position to qualify for the next round.

See Live Streaming Barcelona vs Slavia Prague below.
